extendedInfo.description: *****************************************FLY CHEAP, SLEEP CHEAPBook ANY flight and get a promo code good for an EXTRA 15% off our best deals at thousands of hotels worldwide. See below for full terms & conditions.*****************************************The CheapTickets app for Android offers the ability to search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotels, car rentals, and even vacation packages offered on CheapTickets.com, along with exclusive mobile-only hotel deals of up to 50% off for tonight-only or future hotel stays in more than 200 popular destinations worldwide. The app also gives you access to all your itineraries while on the go.Highlights include:* Search and securely book the same selection of cheap flights, hotels, car rentals, and even vacation packages offered on CheapTickets.com â all via an experience optimized for your Android device* Get exclusive mobile-only hotel deals of up to 50% off for tonight-only or future hotel stays in more than 200 popular destinations worldwide* Find hotels near your current location â great for last-minute bookings* Get 1-tap access to your recent searches* Use powerful hotel sort & filter options to help you quickly find the right hotel for your trip* Swipe through hotel photos and check out ratings & reviews from travelers, including verified CheapTickets bookers* Sign-in to your CheapTickets account for an even faster booking process â the app pre-fills booking info such as name, phone #, frequent flier #, and billing information* Access your itineraries while on the go-----------------------------------------TERMS & CONDITIONS â HOTEL COUPON -----------------------------------------Within 48 hours of booking a standalone flight, you will receive a promotion code via e-mail. The coupon is redeemable for a 15% discount on a qualifying CheapTickets hotel booking that includes a hotel stay of at least one (1) or more consecutive nights. E-mail notification will be sent to the e-mail address associated with each account.15% off hotel offerBook a qualifying hotel by December 31, 2013 11:59PM (CST) for 1 or more nights via CheapTickets and instantly receive 15% off your booking through the use of the promotion code. Limit one discount per hotel room and one promotion code per booking. Discounts are not redeemable for cash for any reason. Promotion codes are non-transferrable, not for resale, and cannot be combined with other offers. Any attempt at fraud will be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted. CheapTickets reserves the right to change or limit the promotion in its sole discretion.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Worked well for me!!!! Best to look up flight on Tuesday, Wednesdays and Saturdays plus at 4am to 9am the cheapest flights are posted.
reviews.author: Chris Silva Santos-Braz

reviews.title: Very low quality.
reviews.comment: Very dissappointed. Booked ticked for minor for $500. Upon arrival to airport Spirit Airlines charged additional $150 for \"unaccompanied minor\". So roundtrip gonna be $500+$300. Resume: no more cheaptickets and Spirit Airlines for me.
reviews.author: Vlad Ball

reviews.title: Trash
reviews.comment: I open it, it shows the title screen then it stays on an all white screen until you close the app. I like the site but your app is wack. I\'ll hold for a bug fix I suppose.

reviews.title: Great but
reviews.comment: Love the app, however when i use the calendar button, i can set the date, but then it sends me to a random web page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love cheaptickets, dont love the app
reviews.comment: Its clunky.  it basically just pulls up the mobile site for you is what it seems like.  Might just be my phone and tablet but if I leave the app for a second to look up info elsewhere (like dates in my calander our emails to coordinate booking info) the app starts all over.  slightly annoying.  Didn\'t see a good way to filter results (at least in \"vacation packages\" section) either, so I could filter by customer review, price, etc, but admittedly by that point I was ready to jump on my pc anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good App

reviews.title: Andy
reviews.comment: Quick access to one of my favorite sites! Thanks!!
